title: bitMaskRead
name: bitMaskRead
description:
Performs a bitwise mask read operation.
        Returns an integer, created from length bits of number,
        beginning at start.

arguments.name: start
arguments.description: Integer, in the range 0-31, inclusive; start bit for read

arguments.name: length
arguments.description: Integer, in the range 0-31, inclusive; length of mask
